      • setParent

        public void setParent(Entity parent)
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Updates the parent of this entity.
        This method makes sure that the old and the new parent keep their entities list updated, by automatically calling Entity.addEntity(Entity) and Entity.removeEntity(Entity).

        A CoreNotificationCodes.ENTITY_PARENT_CHANGED notification is thrown.
        Additionally, each descendant of this entity (ie: entities who have this entity as their direct or not direct parent) are notified using CoreNotificationCodes.ENTITY_ANCESTOR_CHANGED.

        Specified by:
        setParent in interface Entity
        Overrides:
        setParent in class EntityImpl

      • getUpLink

        public NetworkLink getUpLink()
        Description copied from interface: NetworkInterface
        Returns the up-link that is associated with this interface.

        This link is used when uploading (ie: sending data) to the remote interface.

        Specified by:
        getUpLink in interface NetworkInterface
        Returns:
        the up-link that is associated with this interface

      • setUpLink

        public void setUpLink(NetworkLink link)
        Description copied from interface: NetworkInterface
        Update the up-link associated with this interface.
        This link is used when uploading (ie: sending data) to the remote interface.

        Will also ensure that the down-link of the remote network interface is the same as this interface's up-link. Thus, you don't need to call NetworkInterface.setDownLink(NetworkLink) on the remote interface after calling this.

        Specified by:
        setUpLink in interface NetworkInterface

      • getDownLink

        public NetworkLink getDownLink()
        Description copied from interface: NetworkInterface
        Returns the down-link that is associated with this interface.

        This link is used when downloading (ie: receiving data) from the remote interface.

        Specified by:
        getDownLink in interface NetworkInterface
        Returns:
        the down-link that is associated with this interface

      • setDownLink

        public void setDownLink(NetworkLink link)
        Description copied from interface: NetworkInterface
        Update the down-link associated with this interface.
        This link is used when downloading (ie: receiving data) from the remote interface.

        Will also ensure that the up-link of the remote network interface is the same as this interface's down-link. Thus, you don't need to call NetworkInterface.setUpLink(NetworkLink) on the remote interface after calling this.

        Specified by:
        setDownLink in interface NetworkInterface
